trans-unit.source: Represents an activity-based callback.
Activity delegates enable activity authors to expose callbacks with specific signatures that users of the activity can provide activity-based handlers for.
trans-unit.target: 작업 대리자를 통해 작업 작성자는 작업 사용자가 작업 기반 처리기를 제공할 수 있는 특정 시그니처를 사용하여 콜백을 노출할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: There are two types of activity delegates: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601> is used for invoking activities that do not have a return value, and <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> is used for invoking activities that do have a return value.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지 형식의 작업 대리자로, <xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601>은 반환 값이 없는 작업을 호출하는 데 사용되고 <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601>는 반환 값이 있는 작업을 호출하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Activity delegates are useful in scenarios where a child activity must be constrained to having a certain signature.
trans-unit.target: 작업 대리자는 자식 작업이 특정 시그니처를 가지도록 제약되어야 하는 시나리오에서 유용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체를 초기화하기 위해 파생 클래스 생성자에서 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 디버깅, 유효성 검사, 예외 처리 및 추적에 사용되는 선택적 이름을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 디버깅, 유효성 검사, 예외 처리 및 추적에 사용되는 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
When implemented in a derived class, returns the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateOutArgument" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
An out argument for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
Gets or sets the activity that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
The activity that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The list to be populated with runtime arguments.
Supplies a list of runtime arguments for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the arguments that are used by the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의된 경우 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>에서 사용되는 인수를 사용자 지정하는 데 사용될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName" /> property value should be serialized to XAML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName" /> 속성 값을 XAML로 serialize해야 하는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="P:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName" /> 속성 값을 serialize해야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.ShouldSerializeDisplayName%2A> returns `true` if the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A> was explicitly set on the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.ShouldSerializeDisplayName%2A> 반환 `true` 경우는 <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A> 에 명시적으로 설정 된는 <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" /> that contains the <see cref="P:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName" />.
A representation of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" /> that contains the <see cref="P:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName" />.
